data.title: DAMN CROWS, ruining my skylight
data.meta_description:
in the mornings, these damn crows start pecking and walking all over my skylight. 

it's driving me nuts. i dont think that they can break the skylight, but...
data.meta_site_name: AnandTech Forums: Technology, Hardware, Software, and Deals

#1

in the mornings, these damn crows start pecking and walking all over my skylight.

it's driving me nuts. i dont think that they can break the skylight, but this pecking sound in the mornings is killing me.

dighn

Jun 3, 2004

#2

maybe the crows are seeing their own reflections

try putting a piece of paper under it?

#3

Why would crows just randomly peck at your skylight?

Do you have hot female crows in your house or something?

There isn't much you can do. Try and scare them off with a loud noise, they probably won't come back after a few times.

the funny thing is, there are three skylights and they are pecking at mine only....

I've not tried, but have heard of some stuff called Hot Foot - it's a gel type stuff you put where you don't want the birds to be and they get freaked out by the "sticky foot" feeling and won't come back.
